name: Sid's ghost
description:
Journal entry - shoot day 2

“Depression and memories of death a firm reminder that reality as it stands in an illusion and we need to change. Change what is within our power. Fuck what is not. We will die. We must die. What a wonderful word. Know we must change.  Complete impermanence. All aboard..."

100% of the money raised will go to finishing this truly independent film and paying the artists. Four years of blood, sweat and tears. A cult classic in the making.

AUS/NZ Distribution: Pivot Pictures, Filmink Presents

PR + Trailer: https://www.grass-fires.com/blog/milesawaytrailer

5/10

Rolleiflex
